attributes.action: Fund security on school premises where deemed necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work as an assistant caretaker in a large girls school in Kent.More and more we are receiving attention from the nuisance makers,kids ,mainly boys, some of whom have been excluded from other schools.They are getting more and more in your face and are prepared to break into the school to"use the facilities".My school has an active lettings environment and we can be on site till 10.00pm and are open to abuse &attack.Some form of security guard would help to allay fears of physical violence.
